item.title: [SRL][RS2] RIP RSC's autotalker
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

well here it is its pretty basic next version will be better oh and if u get banned using it im not responsible

[code]{_____ _ _____ _____ _____ _____ __ _____
| _ \ | | | _ \ | _ \ / / / | // / /
| || | | | | || | | || | | | | | | |_
| _ / | | | / | _ / _ \ | | __
| | \ \ | | | | | | \ \ | | | | | |
|| _\ || || || _\ // ____| //

 ___   _   _   _____   _____   _____   _____   _____       ___   _   _
/   | | | | | |_   _| /  _  \ /  ___/ |  _  \ | ____|     /   | | | / /

/ /| | | | | | | | | | | | | |___ | || | | |__ / /| | | |/ /
/ / | | | | | | | | | | | | ___ \ | / | __| / / | | | |\
/ / | | | || | | | | || | | | | | | | / / | | | | \
// || _/ || _/ /_____/ || |_____| // || |_| _\

How To Use:
1: Set the const below
2: Put the crosshair on the RS screen
3: Run the script
4: Press f10 or ctrl+alt+s to stop the script

}
Program Autospeak;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
Yourmess = ‘selling lobs’; //what you are selling
yourprice = ’ 200 ea’; //remember to put a space between (’) and your price
yourname = ’ ==RIP RSC==’; //again put a space between (’) and ur name

//color of your text: red green cyan purple white flash1 flash2 flash3
//glow1 glow2 glow3 followed by a (
color =‘cyan:’;

//effect of your text: scroll, shake, slide, wave, wave2 again followed by a (
effect = ‘shake:’;

var
times: integer;

Procedure Speak;
Begin
sendtext(color + effect + yourmess + yourprice + yourname + chr(13));
times :=times + 1;
Wait(Random(200)+200);
End;

procedure ProgressRep;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for RIP RSCs Autospeak.’);
WriteLn(‘Talked: ’ + inttostr(times) + ’ times.’);
Writeln('Your message = '+ yourmess + yourprice + yourname);
Writeln('With the color/effect: '+ color + effect);
end;

Begin
ActivateClient;
Repeat
Speak;
Progressrep;
Until(isfkeydown(10))
End.
[/code]

Progress Report for RIP RSCs Autospeak.
Talked: 38 times.
Your message = selling rune axes 20k ea ==hahaha900==
With the color/effect: cyan:shake:

Read full topic
